title: Pier Luigi Bersani - Wikipedia
snippet: Bersani joined the Italian Communist Party and subsequently the Democratic Party of the Left. As member of the National Secretariat of the Democrats of the Left, he was responsible for the economic sector.

title: Pier Luigi Bersani | Historica Wiki | Fandom
snippet: Pier Luigi Bersani was born in Bettola, Emilia-Romagna in 1951, and he briefly worked as a teacher before joining the Italian Communist Party and subsequently the Democratic Party of the Left.
